delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.content: Are you sure to delete account now?
delete_account.notice: Your account deletion request has been received. We'll notify you via SMS once the process is complete. Your account remains accessible in the meantime.

inactive.title: Your account is locked
inactive.content: Your account is locked, please contact inquiry@esg-c.org to release.

error.1005: This prize does not belong to your organization!
error.1006: You can redeem this prize once only!
